reviewText:
My teenage son has really enjoyed the series and anything I can do to get him away from prime-time TV (garbage) is worth it.  The price on these was great ($15 for two seasons)so I bought them all.

Well worth the investment.

The classic is still applicable.  The Cosby Show dealt with real life situations, solving actual problems that parents and non-parents encounter, and it did it in an inventive and humorous way.  Seasons 5 and 6 continue to capture that essential element.  Even though the resolution isn't HD, these are still worth the time to watch.  I cant get enough of it.
I enjoy every last episodes of these two seasons. My daughter and I watch Cosby's before bedtime. Instead of a bedtime story we have bedtime Cosby.

I've always loved the Cosby Show but admittedly season 5 was not my favourite. However, I had to have all the seasons and when I found out there was a Seasons 5 & 6 DVD for the price of $15, I had to buy it. Now, I thought that this was the two seasons in one case with the cover being how it looks here, in green with the two pictures of Cosby. But no! It was actually the two separate seasons, two DVD sets shrinkwrapped together! So I was amazed at what I received - a great value! Now I have to decide if I want to buy the last two seasons (as this same value pack) just to complete my collection :-)

Cosby is one of the all time great television shows. This DVD collection, especially at the bargain basement price of $5 per season, is a must own. It makes lite of many family situations. Family sitcoms should aspire to this today.
Great Item. Just as described.
Was a gift for family member. He loves the series and was very happy with the series.
Why isn't this show on Amazon Prime Video????  It really needs to be. Would love to have all the Seasons in my collection
Love it
Definitely one of the best shows of all time!
thank you.
I love love season 5 & 6. I really was excited that Lisa Bonet character had returned. Good quality and fabulous episodes. A huge fan of The Cosby Show.
Don't put money in Bill's rapey pockets.
Timeless!
Funny and clean
Wonderful  family  series
great laugh
Great! Out takes should have been at the end instead of the middle, in season 6.
GREW UP WITH THIS AND ENJOYING IT NOW
Love it.
Gave as present.  Good family show.
Watched as a kid, now my kids are enjoying the hilarity of the Cosby family.
Very good. I love the Cosby Show.
You can't go wrong with The Cosby Show
Love my Cosby series
Very Good DVD set..Great Bargain !!

It's just continually getting better and better as we go along in the lives of the Huxtable clan... No matter what truth comes out about Cosby... and the truth about those so-called "women" he "supposedly" drugged and raped, HIS LEGACY WILL LIVE ON IN THIS SHOW!!!
Great entertainment for entire family.  Shipping on time as promised.
The product was in excellent condition  and have thoroughly enjoyed these series.
great
Really enjoyed this clean family show.
I love Cosby!!!!!!
Really is there a better TV Sitcom Children can watch without parents wondering what is in it.  NO!  Cosby is still the best for Family entertainment.
A gift for my wife who was a HUGE fan of the show growing up. She'll appreciate having this as part of her video library.
I finally got them all. This is a great series. Love it.
Classic

Really great
Watched this show as a child.  Now we are sharing it with our kiddos!  Loves it!
Awesome!!
Great show
A great series especially for the first 6 years. Great show for family viewing. Lots of humor and wisdom.
love the show
I wanted every episode and I got it!! Great price and fast shipping
not complete  but it was cheap
Love this show!

Have the entire collection & we watch them all the time. It is the best sitcom that's family oriented, comical, clean & delivers a real life positive msg that our new generation should see & follow & get back to. Will treasure & show always to the old & young. We do Cosby marathons all the time. Highly recommend instead of Reality shows. Never had any complaints

I am buying this item to replace the inferior release of The 25th Anniversary Edition by First Look Studios. Several of the discs have scratches, but were playable. I feel that the two sets I just bought will keep what I have intact for the future. At this time when Bill Cosby is under attack by several women, some who lack credibility, this was a good TV program. It has been taken off the air, since the stations involved are awaiting the outcome of these allegations. It is amusing to me as the Daughter of two Lawyers, that the statute of limitations is long over. Why have as many as thirty some women come forward? What is their real beef with Mr. Cosby? I still believe the program is safe to show to children, but they may ask questions about the negative publicity. Parents need to be able to explain that nothing has been proven up to this point. Think for yourself how you feel about the program.
I love the Crosby Shows.waiting to purchase season 7 and 8 to complete the set.
I love the Cosby Show!
I love the Cosby show
Love this show! I haven't had a chance to watch it yet, but I am super glad I found it...and at such a reasonable price too!!
Video arrived on time and exactly as described.
No matter the controversy I still love this show!
good for family
One of the greatest sitcoms of all time!
Enjoyed to the fullest.
GOOD SHOW
I love this show, and I'm so glad I can share it with my children!
Always my favorite
Always enjoyed this show as kid and now as an adult. Makes me laugh again and again.
This show always makes me happy
Great, love the DVD's.

I love this show and this was a very economical purchase.  My only complaint is that when I stop an episode at the end and restart on a different day, it doesn't remember which episode I was on and starts over on the first episode of the disc.  It's not my player as it normally remembers my position with other movies.  It's a minor inconvenience and I still recommend them.  The clarity is the same as I remember watching them when they were on TV in the 80's.
Nice
I liked this show growing up , now my young children enjoy it !
The only complaint is that the discs are stacked on top of each other.
Great

Arrived as promised. Picture displays well on HD television. The only thing I didn't like is that the DVD's are all stacked on top of each other in one case. I guess for the price you really do get what you pay for...so I moved my discs to other empty CD cases to keep them from getting scratch from trying to remove and then replace them in this tight no-room packaging.
Excellent product, great show for a great price. Excellent viewing for families of all ages.
wonderful DVD can't wait till I get to hold collection
So sweet

The show it's self is 5 stars. But the 4 stars are for the packaging. 4 discs stacked on top of each other is not very cool. But that's easily fixed with buying some 4 discs cases. On to the show...
The show is amazing. I wish they made decent shows like this nowadays....except for Clair Huxtable. One of the very few tv characters that I wouldn't mind pushing down the stairs....
great show and  very good value.
Great family movies
I am well pleased with thsee episodes great work .
The Cosby Show is good family entertainment!  Love it!
great show
All the taps were great  thank you
Exactly what I was expecting.
Really enjoy this show and the price was very reasonable.
Loved it!
Love it!
There is not enough words....I Always loved Bill Cosby and I love these DVD. Thank you
good

This movie is the top favorite of all time and I highly recommend this movie to all that is in love with comedy and drama. This movie is so inspiring and I truly love it!! I had no problems with it since then.
Bill Cosby is the best! He must be the world's most perfect dad and husband. Either that - or he is the world's best actor! Love it!
Awesome!
The Cosby Show is a great situation/family value comedies of the years this show's been on the air. Its funny and heartwarming that it makes you look at your life to help you improve it.
I loved the Cosby show in the 80s.  Who didn't? I think the earlier seasons were funnier and better, but they're all still fun to watch.
I enjoyed the Cosby TV series but never could find all the DVDs I didn't have.  This DVD is exacty what it's described to be--entertaining. I was amazed at the short time it took for delivery.

at the risk of being repetitious, my son and daughter grew up watching The Cosby Show and she wanted to share that with her hubby (who never watched the show) and her 6 children.  Once they were don't they gave them to another homeschooling family who was blessed by them and "paid it forward" so I feel so blessed to have been able to find them at Amazon.com!
I love this collection; it's so funny and touching; plus it plays like new. Thanks again and hope to do more business with you in the future

Got this for my children for Christmas. Love these shows they have good morals and you don't have to worry about what there watching and they learn things too. They have season 1-4 and so I'll get the rest for them too.

Got these DVD's for my daughter for Christmas and she loves them. She is not interested in the new sit-coms but loves most of the old ones.
I was very pleased with the prompt delivery and condition.
Thanks

The Cosby Show itself gets 5 stars! My television sitcom to watch, one thing good about this dvds; unedited scenes! I'm giving this 4 stars, while watching season 6 "Not Everybody Loves The Blues" that episode seems to skip at the beginning with Theo & Elvin in the club. Also unlike season 1 that plays all the episodes with one click, season 2-8 are not "play all" friendly, well I guess you get what you pay for. Other than that, I watch these classics and wish I was a Huxtable kid. Enjoy folks!

Every episode is excellent, allows families to watch without fear of inappropriate messaging, and language. This was one of the best series of  family relationship that one could purchase on TV today.  Psychologically if a Parent could nurture in such a manner today the relationships within the family structure would become normal instead of broken in so many cases.  Definitely it is too bad individuals will watch other obscene series while missing excellent Parenting Skills when many different crisis's happen in normal life.

Awesome, good, wholesome family fun!  A show I can watch with all my children and never have to worry about bad language or scenes.  I watched it as a child and it is great to see my four kids enjoying it years later.  Bill Cosby always brings a smile to everyone's face.
This dvd is a great must have for any people in the world the love anything. It teaches life, death, family and everything in between.  A must own.

I Love this program.
The quality is great.
It's easy to use. I plan on ordering more of this program and will continue to order from amazon because it's so easy and so dependable.
Good sound family counseling with the spark of comedy! So sad that only has 8 seasons. If it had more I would continue to buy them all. COSBY FAMILY IF YOU READ THIS, THANKS FOR SHARING YOUR TALENT!!
How could you not love it! Season 6 was lacking a little bit but overall, this was a wonderful gift set to give someone!
After getthing the first sets (1 - 4) my sons had to have this set too. Boy did they go through this set fast!
What a great purchase for me -Funny and informative! I'm on my way to purchase more from this Seller of the show - Great price for 2 seasons, great condition of cover and disc and received timely.
This product was exactly as promised and met my needs as soon as I received it.  The product works flawlessly!

The movie was in perfect condition
and it arrived right on time.
The price was good. The kids love
the show and watch them over and over

My husband and I love watching the Cosby shows so much that we bought all of the series. What's not to love? Just wish they would have set the titles up differently. You have to go through all of the list to get to the show where you left off watching.

Classic and timeless...what else is there to say.
The New Leave it to Beaver and Ozzie and Harriet for everyone.
Dr. Cosby and Dr. Pouissant knew exactly what they were doing.
Great bundle of seasons 5 and 6. No "play all" option or bonus features, but other than that, they are definitely "must-haves" for Cosby fans.
I love the Cobsys and I was glad that I was able to purchase this product at a reasonable price.
Bill Cosby & cast, through acting, show one of many successful lifestyles. There is some exageration, but worth watching. No "R" rated stuff.

My daughter absolutely loves the Cosby series after 20+ years it's still a Hit in our house.  Although a day later that promised, which I belive was the postal service, it was in excellent The CD's were in pristine condition, neatly wrapped and packaged securely.
You just can't beat the Cosby show.  Item was just as described and came new and in its packaging.  All the disks play great.
It is timeless classics about family values and struggles always engaged with a sense of humor that our whole family loves to watch over and over.
Totally awesome.  He has such a way to put across messages about family life in a humorous way.  I have recommended this to everyone.
Watched and re-watched all the series and now have all the complete series. I can now watched my favorites whenever I want.
This was a Christmas gift for my son. We are both enjoying it. Olivia is precious. Like the whole family.

I had to give this terrific TV show 4 stars only due to product issues. There is something wrong with the sound channels, many times the left or right channel goes much fainter, I have noticed when there is a camera change, is also when the sounds cut low. It happens from Season 1 to about season 6. I watch this, along with Roseanne and Sinfeld, when I go to bed so I have head phones one. The other two TV shows has no issues with the sound, so I know it's not my DVD player. I am now watching the Cosby series again for the second time since I bought these, the sound is still an issue, it's very very annoying. I'm rather disappointed in that. So, with that, this is a review about the products, the physical product would only get something like a 1 star, the THE COSBY SHOW product, the show itself, certainly gets a 5 stars.

Seeing the Bill Cosby show again and again keeps me in stiches and brings back memories of a great TV family comedy series.  I had forgotten how much I enjoyed this series. It's also a good sharing video for uplifting your relatives (and friends) in the nursing home.  The Bill Cosby show is a good conversation DVD to show for those who are not watching all-day football games on Thanksgiving or for those who are having any family/friend dinner gathering.

We own seasons 1-6  and we just purchased seasons seven and eight as we want our children to see what real T.V. and good T.V. shows really are and because we love this T.V. series, its clean fun and funny! Great for family laughs! We cut the cord on cable and now view TV though our DVD collection or watch though Netflix on our Roku. We just grew tired of paying for paid TV with nothing good to watch.

We read a review saying how this show used to be on Netflix and was for some reason taking off of Netflix, don't know why... But it is okay for us as we like to take our DVD's with us while on the road as it makes for some fun times. This has also come in handy when we are out and have to wait for long periods of time.. This happen recently and The Cosby Show saved the day! We started season one and before we knew it, it was time to go on to our next destination.

So back to the reason we went ahead and purchased this collection. Due to the garbage on T.V. these days, looks like many people are looking for great T.V. shows and are turning to shows like this again. Many people are tired of paying for trash T.V. so they have found other ways to view T.V. the way they want to. Looks like this is the growing attitudes with paid for TV these days.. And I know many like the Cosby show so it is in demand!

While shopping on Amazon we selected the used copy we wanted and while still shopping someone else purchased the copy we had in our cart so we lost that copy and had to select another copy that cost more. I guess that goes to show how great this show is, everyone is grabbing copies of it.(demand for this show is good)(which is good, because this should show producers that people really want to watch).

Anyway, our family loves this show and glad that we were still able to find a used copy for a decent price.. We don't want to spend too much money out of our budget. We are just glad to be able to watch T.V. the way we want to and not have to pay for crap TV. We are tired of today's T.V. shows.. It's really sad that such a good method of influence has turned into trash T.V with the exception of National Geo etc.. Any way, if you want clean T.V. this is it!

I can say since we cut cable off we have a better free life.. seems like we have more family time and time to do the things that we want to do. Plus we pay for the shows that we want like The Cosby show since it is not on Netflix. I am glad that this T.V. series is available on Amazon.

This T.V. Series teaches a lot of great lessons and also entertains you.. Miss those days of shows like this. So if you are looking for clean great family fun, this show is for you.. You will not be disappointed. Our children love this show! This show could even go for parental education!

Bill Cosby is great and we are thankful to enjoy such talent! We wish that the Fatherhood cartoon would be released on DVD. Two seasons on Nick Nite (2004-2005 season run time and has been canceled). and twenty six episodes.. This was a great cartoon with values, please release this on DVD. And also Little Bill on DVD.

Happy viewing! And if you are looking for more funny shows, don't for get The PJ's with Eddie Murphy, Martin show, My wife and Kids, Jamie Foxx show, and What's happening! Great shows, real T.V.

Shipping was as expected and we are in the process of viewing all the DVD's so we can see how they play!
thanks.

I had never watched "The Cosby Show" until I got pregnant and my husband decided to start watching it on Netflix. I immediately loved it and wanted to watch the whole thing - all 8 seasons - before our baby was born. Well, that obviously didn't happen but we kept watching it even after our baby girl was born, until one day Netflix decided to remove "The Cosby Show" from the "watch instantly" feature and we had to stop. I was so frustrated that I decided I wanted to buy all 8 seasons of The Cosby Show - not only so that I could finish it, but also to be able to show it to my daughter when she's older! So, we purchased all 8 seasons and I'm so glad we did because we now own hours and hours of comedy that will always be timeless and entertaining.

Before I purchased from this seller, I looked at other sellers from which I could order the same product and have it shipped through Amazon Prime, however, their product was about $100.00 more expensive than from this seller, and it was the exact same product! Also, the shipping was faster than I expected and totally worth paying the $12.00 extra dollars. I'm very pleased with my purchase!
Finally a program I had when I grew up that teaches kids good values and is not full of violence. Excellent.

I love anything done by Cosby including this series.  The only thing I don't like is you have to start
each episode.  I like the way the Andy Griffith series was done better where you could choose to play them
all or one episode at a time.

I have always liked Bill Cosby and his humourous take on life and family relationships. I watched the Cosby Show on tv in the '80's and loved it, so I am enjoying the show all over again  on DVD. I am glad I have this in my collection.

Received the video quickly.  These seasons are when the show really takes off.  There is no better show on TV - ever so me and my kids have started from the beginning and are watching every season over time.  The video quality have these seasons are up to modern quailty (the first 2 were poorer video quality but still worth watching)
Great condition. Granddaughter loves them.
ok
Perfect arrived right on time. I like it is good

I loved this show as a kid, and still do. I can watch it with my kids in the room and not be afraid that something inappropriate will pop onto the screen. Regardless of any drama in the lives of the actors, the humorous interactions of this fictional family is good clean fun. This remains one of the cleanest, funniest shows ever.
Great show. All the DVDs are fine and work well.

We have been watching these with our kids (ages 5-9) as a fun lunchtime family show.  We have Seasons 1-4.  It seems that the content (although not "bad") in Seasons 5-6 is less appropriate for younger kids.  I'd be more comfortable letting my kids watch if they were 12+ yrs.  Seasons 1-4 are mostly great for younger kids with exception of a few episodes (i.e. drug themes, teen pregnancy themes, etc).

The four stars is just because the themes are more grown up b/c the kids in the show are more grown up (with exception of the new baby twins and the introduction of Olivia).  Overall a great family show!!!
Classic

Love this show! I have loved this show since I was a kid and I will continue to love it and watch it. Every episode is hilarious and heartwarming. I miss tv shows that actually teach lessons while they entertain.
Such a good show :) good quality dvd's, even if the way they put the DVDs in the case is not the most convenient, that's how they all are.
Hilarious show
